mapper.sql: USER_ID, PASSWORD, MOBILE, MOBILE_VERIFY_FLAG, EMAIL, EMAIL_VERIFY_FLAG, QQ_BIND_FLAG, WEIXIN_BIND_FLAG, SINA_WEIBO_BIND_FLAG, TECENT_WEIBO_FLAG, REAL_NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, FAIL_TIMES, LAST_IP, LAST_TIME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ADDRESS, USER_STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPD_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (USER_ID, PASSWORD, MOBILE, MOBILE_VERIFY_FLAG, EMAIL, EMAIL_VERIFY_FLAG, QQ_BIND_FLAG, WEIXIN_BIND_FLAG, SINA_WEIBO_BIND_FLAG, TECENT_WEIBO_FLAG, REAL_NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, FAIL_TIMES, LAST_IP, LAST_TIME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ADDRESS, USER_STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPD_TIME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileVerifyFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailVerifyFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{qqBindFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{weixinBindFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sinaWeiboBindFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tecentWeiboFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failTimes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
